name: Hastings Air, LLC
about: Hastings Air, LLC, located at the Hastings Municipal Airport in Nebraska, is a comprehensive flight training and Fixed Base Operator (FBO) facility. We offer professional flight instruction for private, commercial, and instrument ratings, as well as multi-engine training. Our services include aircraft rental, charter services, and full-service fueling with ACE certified line crew. We provide comfortable amenities such as a pilotâ€™s lounge, kitchen, internet access, and a snooze room. Our goal is to deliver hassle-free and streamlined services to meet all your aviation needs, ensuring a supportive and efficient learning environment for aspiring pilots. At Hastings Air, we are dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
